definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: male (As. zikaru, zikru, COT:Gloss Lyon:Manual, Gloss; Ar. d-akarun; Aram. [[דִּכְרָא]], dekro0; Sab. [[רם]][[[כ]]][[דַ]] DHM:ZMG 1876, 675; relation to above √ obscure; male as mentioned, talked of, Lane:969 f.; fr. assumed orig. sense be sharp (traces of this in Arab.: v. Lane), Bö:Prob 207 Fl in ChWB:i. 422, cf. Ar. d-akarun male organ; Schwally:ZAW 1891, 176 ff. fr. [[זׇכַר]] = call upon in worship; hence male as competent to worship)—alw. abs. ´[[ז]] Ge 1:27 +; pl. [[זְכָרִים]]([[ה]]) Ex 13:12 +; vid. also [[[זׇכוּר]]]:—

definitions.title: I.
definitions.body: subst. male, offspring of men and animals Ex 13:12, Ex 13:15 (pl., both JE); opp. [[נְקֵבָה]] De 4:16; specif.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: in phr. [[אישׁ לְמִשְׁכַב זׇכָר אשׁר לא יׇֽדְעָה]] Ju Jdg 21:12 (Bu:RS 153 Dr:Intr. 151), cf. v:11, Nu 31:17, Nu 31:18, Nu 31:35 (all 3 P); [[חַלְמֵי זׇכָר]] Ez Eze 16:17.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: alone = man Je 30:6 ([[רְאוּ אִם־יׁלֵד זׇכָָר]] ‖[[גֶּבֶר ]]); usu. coll., men, male persons (of all ages) Ju Jdg 21:11, 1Ki 11:15, 1Ki 11:16, Ge 34:25, Le 6:11, Le 6:22, Le 7:6, Nu 1:2, Nu 1:20, Nu 1:22, Nu 3:28, Nu 3:34, Nu 3:39, Nu 18:10, Nu 26:62, Nu 31:7, Nu 31:17, (all P); pl. [[זכרים]]([[ה]]) 2Ch 31:16, Ezr 8:3, Ezr 8:4, Ezr 8:5, Ezr 8:6, Ezr 8:7, Ezr 8:8, Ezr 8:9, Ezr 8:10, Ezr 8:11, Ezr 8:12, Ezr 8:13, Ezr 8:14, so also Jos 5:4 (‖[[העם כל־]], and [[כל־אנשׁי המלחמה]]), Jos 17:2 (gloss? cf. Dr:Intr. 104); esp. of individ., in connex. with circumcision Ge 17:10, Ge 17:12, Ge 17:14, Ge 17:23, Ge 34:15, Ge 34:22, Ge 34:24, Ex 12:48 (all P); of male child Le 12:2 (P) Is 66:7; opp. [[נְקֵבָה]] Ge 1:27, Ge 5:2, Le 12:7 (child) Le 15:33, Le 27:3, Le 27:5, Le 27:6, Le 27:7, Nu 5:3 (all P; cf. Sab. [[רם]]([[כ]])[[אנתַים פאו דַ]] DHM:l. c.); opp. [[אִשָּׁה]] in command ag. sodomy Le 18:22, Le 20:13 (both H).

of animals, esp. for sacrifice Ex 34:19 (JE; rd. [[הַזׇּכָר]] for MT [[תִּזׇּכָר]]); Ex 12:5, Le 1:3, Le 1:10, Le 4:23 (all P) Le 22:19 (H), Mal 1:14; opp. [[נְקֵבָה]] Ge 6:19, Ge 7:3, Ge 7:9, Ge 7:16, Le 3:1, Le 3:6 (all P).

definitions.title: II.
definitions.body: adj. sg. male (only human beings) ´[[יֻלַּד־לְךָ בֵּן ז]] Je 20:15; ´[[כָּל־בְּכׂר ז]] Nu 3:40, Nu 3:43 (both P).
